Director of Public Policy and Studies

profile_positions.description: Analysis on the relevance and use of open data for the prevention of corruption

profile_positions.description: Extraction and classification of social media publications in Spanish used for the estimation of clients’ reputation.
profile_positions.title: Research Analyst

profile_positions.description: Collection of data needed for the elaboration of the “THE World University Rankings 2019” in Spanish-speaking universities.
profile_positions.title: Official translator

profile_positions.description:
- Estimation of the economic value of prosecuted corruption in Bogotá D.C. 
- Estimation of the components of the Urban Human Development Index (Income, education, health and mobility) with the latest survey information available for the city. 
- Development of Bogotá’s Citizen Complaints Dashboard, in co-partnership with Bloomberg Associates. 
- Formulation of Bogotá’s Public Innovation Index. 
- Proofreading and data validation of briefings related to urban topics: poverty, environment, education, labour market, etc.
- Proofreading and data validation of institutional reports before their publication (focus on the reports related to public spending monitoring in the city, execution of the City Development Plan and sectorial reports).
profile_positions.title: Economic Advisor

profile_positions.description:
- Design the Institutional Competitive Intelligence procedure.
- Collect external quantitative and qualitative information related to Colombian maritime sector: maritime transport, maritime activities, marine environmental protection, merchant marine, maritime spatial planning and seamen formation and education, among other topics.  
- Analysis of the strategic relevance of the compiled information at the light of the institutional strategic objectives.
- Reporting of the most relevant information to the General Maritime Director, suggesting possible scenarios and its outcomes.
- Elaboration of quarterly reports with the main findings of the implementation of the Competitive Intelligence Procedure.
- Analysis of the main political, economic, social, technological, environmental and legal trends that affect maritime sector every Annual Strategic Planning Workshop.
- Contribution to the update of the Institutional Strategic Plan – Vision 2030 using techniques from prospective analysis.
- Elaboration of reports about current affairs in the maritime sector, under request of the Director of the Planning Office and/or the General Maritime Director.
profile_positions.title: Planning Professional

profile_positions.description:
- Grant awarded by the Colombian Institute of Science, Technology and Innovation (COLCIENCIAS), in the framework of the Young Researchers Program 2012 "Virginia Gutierrez de Pineda".  
- Development of the research project “Labour informality in the urban centres of Colombia: does it depend on forced displacement?”.

Publication: Informalidad laboral en los centros urbanos de Colombia: ¿Depende del
desplazamiento forzado? Revista Vniversitas Económica, Vol 13(4), 2013, Pontificia Universidad Javeriana.
profile_positions.title: Young Researcher

profile_positions.description:
- Contribution to the daily estimation of the monetary base and M1 in Colombia. 
- Matching of historical financial sheets of Colombian banking system from 1921 to 2011.
profile_positions.title: Intern
